code: import React from"react";import ApexCharts from"react-apexcharts";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";var series=[{name:"Website Blog Visits",data:[670,720,770,690,900,970,1030]},{name:"Social Media Visits",data:[760,590,910,850,700,1050,920]}];var chartSettings={dataLabels:{enabled:false},stroke:{curve:"smooth",width:2},xaxis:{type:"category",categories:["Mon","Tue","Wed","Thu","Fri","Sat","Sun"],labels:{style:{colors:"#6B859E",opacity:0.7}}},yaxis:{labels:{style:{colors:["#6B859E"],opacity:0.7}}},tooltip:{x:{show:false}},fill:{type:"gradient",gradient:{shadeIntensity:1,opacityFrom:0.7,opacityTo:1,stops:[40,90,100]}},colors:["#AF478A","#41D5E2"],chart:{toolbar:{show:false}},legend:{show:true,horizontalAlign:"center"}};export default function ApexLineChart(){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ApexCharts,{options:chartSettings,series:series,type:"area",height:300});}
